DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project compare performance Pediatric Vision Scanner ( PVS ) Gold Standard Examination determine effectiveness PVS detect amblyopia strabismus . All test observation do single visit course approximately 30 minute .
DOC.brief_title: Amblyopia Strabismus Detection Using Pediatric Vision Scanner
DOC.criteria: Children age 6 month 6 year Signed Informed consent parent guardian Meet inclusion criterion . Children history developmental delay cognitive deficit Children unable complete GSE ( include visual acuity test )
